title: "OpenAI improves its AI-powered content filter and makes it free to use"
excerpt: "The nonprofit artificial intelligence research outfit OpenAI Inc. today announced a major update to its free content moderation tool, and it’s available now to all developers. The updated Moderation endpoint enables access via an application programming interface to OpenAI’s Generative Pre-trained Transformer-based classifiers,"
